Dialogue.Nodes:
0 Kir4 What are you doing out here? Why aren´t you in the shelter?4
Continue 1
1 Dying Man I scaped from the pyramid. I worked for them. Since I´m already useless they want me as nourishment.5
Continue 2
2 Dying Man I almost succeed. But then they sent the drones after me. One of them hit me on the leg.5
Continue 3
3 Dying Man I can´t keep walking. Will you have any food to give me?5
Here you are 4
Where´s the pyramid? 5
Help thetraitor? 6
4 Kira Here you are. I will bring you energy. I´m on my way to the pyramid. Could you help me?5
Continue 7
5 Kir4 I'm sorry but I must keep my supplies for the rest of the journey.5
Continue 12
6 Kir4 Food for a traitor? I should kill you.4
Continue 17
7 Dying Man The pyramid? Follow this path. You will see it soon.4
Continue 8
8 Kira You know who 4l4n Bl4nc0 is? Did you see him?3
Continue 9
9 Dying Man 4l4n? The scientist! An slave assured he had seen him. He was cryogenized. But in the pyramid little can be seen and a lot is making up. They say one day someone will come to save him. Is it you? I though it was a legend.8
Continue 10
10 Kir4 When you reach a bunker, don´t mention you scaped from the pyramid. Traitors are not welcomed.6
Continue 11
11 Dying Man No one is a traitor till it has the need. Good luck in your journey. And watch the drones. You must move stealthily. Otherwise they will detect you.6
Exit -1
12 Dying Man Where are you heading for? I may help you.3
Continue 13
13 Kir4 I'm heading for the pyramid. Could you tell me if I´m in the righ direction?4
Continue 14
14 Dying Man Why would you want to go there? It´s a death sentence.4
Continue 15
15 Kir4 Have you seen 4l4n Bl4nc0 in the pyramid?4
Continue 16
16 Dying Man 4l4n? I can´t recall anyone with than name.4
Exit -1
17 Dying Man Wait! You are heading for the pyramid, right? You are looking for the scientist, right? They said one day someone would come to liberate him. I thought it was just a legend. One of the legends spread by the slaves.9
Continue 18
18 Kir4 What do you know about 4l4n?3
Continue 19
19 Dying Man A slave told he was awake from cryogenic. He has a little time left. They will kill him. Hurry up! If you move fast the drones won´t reach you.8
Exit -1
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
20 Kir4 I need to rush. My time is running out. So is 4l4n´s time. I can feel it. His part of the Map is fading out.7
Exit -1
/////////////////////////////////
21 Kira What do I have here? I´ve found one of the puzzle boxes 3rn3st0 Bl4nc0 made up for his family. It may contain something useful. But I have to guess how to open it… Be focused, Kir4.8
Exit -1
/////////////////////////////////
22 Kir4 According to 4del4´s coordinates it must be the ship where the family Bl4nc0 was captured.7
Exit -1
/////////////////////////////////
23 Kir4 Apparently 3rn3st0 enjoys challenging his family...4
Exit -1
/////////////////////////////////
24 Kir4 Look at this beauties! 4l4n didn´t have time to use them. I´m sure he doesn´t mind if I do it.6
Exit -1
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25 Kir4 I'll need special gear to climb these walls or I'll skin my hands....6
Exit -1
26 Kir4 That was a close call....6
Exit -1
27 Kir4 Hey! Whoaaah...!.6
Exit -1
